narrative.narrative: Nolinor Aviation is a duel passenger and cargo charter airline based at Montreal-Mirabel. Other primary bases of operation are Montreal-Trudeau,Winnipeg,Waterloo,and Val-d'Or. It started in 1997 and mainly served hunters and fishers but soon began service to all sorts of passengers and started doing cargo. In 2001 it got a Convair 580 for cargo use and began doing that throughout north Canada and into the US. In 2004 it got two more and in 2006 it got a passenger version. It now has 5 total as of June 2014. In 2007 it got two 737-200 Adv. combi's and in 2011 a full cargo version. It got another combi soon after.In 2014 it got a Learjet 31 corporate jet. It also has the right permissions to maintain its own planes.
